contentList.content: Rhythm Maker
While holding this drum, you gain a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Spell Attack Rolls</LSTag> and +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
Deadeye
While holding this fife, you gain a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and deal an additional [2] damage.
Defender
While holding this dulcimer, your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> is increased by [1] and your incoming damage is reduced by [2].
Critical Cadence
While holding this violin, the number you need to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">roll</LSTag> a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> is reduced by [1]. This effect can stack.
Vanguard
While holding this lyre, you gain a +[1] bonus to Initiative Rolls.
Reveler
While holding this drum, you gain a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
Dostrealt's Disadvantage

While you grasp Dostrealt's Piccolo, a shroud of obscurity descends upon your senses, distorting your perception and casting shadows where there should be light, akin to the enigmatic veil that once obscured the sight of the famed blind wizard himself.
+1 Rhythm Maker's Drum
A basic drum crafted for novice spellcasters, resonating with mystical rhythms to enhance spellcasting abilities with its primal beat.
+2 Rhythm Maker's Drum
A refined drum with improved craftsmanship, pulsating with arcane energy to amplify spellcasting prowess for seasoned enchanters.
+3 Rhythm Maker's Drum
An expertly-crafted drum of very rare quality, infused with the essence of a master spellweaver, empowering spellcasters with unparalleled magical resonance and potent incantations.
+1 Deadeye's Fife
A basic fife crafted for novices, offering modest improvements in accuracy and damage for budding marksmen
+2 Deadeye's Fife
A refined fife with enhanced craftsmanship, delivering sharper tones and increased damage for seasoned shooters.
+3 Deadeye's Fife
An expertly-crafted fife of very rare quality, imbued with the essence of a master marksman, granting unparalleled accuracy and devastating damage on the battlefield.
+1 Defender's Dulcimer
A basic dulcimer crafted for novice defenders, offering modest enhancements to resilience and damage mitigation.
+2 Defender's Dulcimer
A refined dulcimer with improved craftsmanship, providing strengthened defenses and reduced damage for seasoned guardians.
+3 Defender's Dulcimer
An expertly-crafted dulcimer of very rare quality, suffused with the essence of a master defender, bestowing unmatched resilience and unparalleled damage reduction upon its wielder.
+1 Critical Cadence Violin
A basic violin crafted for aspiring performers, imbuing a subtle increase in critical chance with its melodious strains.
+2 Critical Cadence Violin
A finely-tuned violin with enhanced craftsmanship, resonating with precise tones to elevate critical chance for seasoned players.
+3 Critical Cadence Violin
An exquisite violin of very rare quality, emanating a mesmerizing melody that heightens critical chance to extraordinary levels, a testament to the masterful artistry of its creator.
+1 Vanguard's Verse Lyre
A basic lyre crafted for novice adventurers, harmonizing with invigorating melodies to heighten alertness and readiness for battle
+2 Vanguard's Verse Lyre
A refined lyre with improved craftsmanship, weaving enchanting tunes that bolster vigilance and swift reaction for seasoned warriors.
+3 Vanguard's Verse Lyre

An expertly-crafted lyre of very rare quality, resonating with the essence of a master tactician, instilling unparalleled alertness and battle-readiness in its wielder, ensuring victory on the frontline.
Ollamh Harp

The first Ollamh harps were created by a legendary bard in the Moonshae Isles named Falataer. He used them to test and reward the students of the Ollamh level of his bardic college, which came to be regarded individually as a legendary bard college in its own right.
Siren Song Lyre
A hauntingly beautiful instrument, its melodic strains whisper of distant shores and lost dreams, bewitching all who hear with its enchanting allure and mysterious power.
Reveler's Hand Drum

Infused with the enchanting magic of revelry, its rhythmic beats compel all who hear to dance with unbridled joy, igniting spontaneous celebrations wherever its lively tunes are played, even coaxing reluctant feet to join the revelry.
Violin of Illusions
Its haunting melodies weave a tapestry of enchantment, conjuring vivid illusions that dance before the mind's eye of listeners, blurring the lines between reality and fantasy with each haunting note.
Pipe of Haunting

Its eerie tunes echo with whispers of the beyond, casting a chilling aura that seeps into the minds of listeners, stirring primal fears and planting seeds of paranoia that grow with each haunting refrain.
Sound Burst
Release an echo of damaging sound waves that may <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="STUNNED">Stun</LSTag> enemies.
